item.title: natural delights | lovely things | tasty stuff | homemade
item.description:
natural delights | lovely things | tasty stuff | homemade

As the title suggests...this site is an essential oil lover's thoughts, musing's & ideas for a more natural, holistic, healthy & enjoyable way of life........full of natural delights, lovely things, tasty stuff & things you can make at home...Click to find out a little more about me.

item.title: DIY Strawberry Lime Sugar Scrub | doTERRA Essential Oils
item.description:
DIY Strawberry Lime Sugar Scrub | doTERRA Essential Oils

This Strawberry Lime Sugar scrub literally smells like fresh strawberry jam and is even easier to make. And, get this, it is 100% edible.

item.title: Homemade Loot...it’s all good!
item.description:
Homemade Loot...it’s all good!

There is some amount of great satisfaction in knowing that you made something; that what you have made is from natural organic and easily sourced materials and most importantly it is free from many of those unpleasant toxins and chemicals found in many commercial store bought products.

item.title: Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread
item.description:
Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread

Ever gone to the kitchen, opened the fridge & just stood in front of the cold opening just staring at the contents blindly thinking "I have nothing to eat!"....? Well that was me the other day, it was ridiculous...

item.title: Fresh Flowers make you smile
item.description:
Fresh Flowers make you smile

There is something so delightful about the sights and smells of fresh flowers; they have the ability to pick you up, transport you, chill you out, smile, remember...

item.title: Best Ever DIY Deodorant
item.description:
Best Ever DIY Deodorant

Ooh, I am excited to share with you...the best homemade do-it-yourself (DIY) deodorant ever!!! I am actually surprised that I make & use it...but I tell you what, I am totally converted & will not be returning to that shop bought stuff again...

item.title: Relaxing DIY Bath Salts
item.description:
Relaxing DIY Bath Salts

You too can make some fabulous & therapeutic bath salts...add your favourite essential oil(s), rest back and soak in the delights!

item.title: Chewy Sultana Cookies | Deliciously Ella
item.description:
Chewy Sultana Cookies | Deliciously Ella

Preheat the oven to 200C Grate the apples (no need to peel them) and mash the bananas. Drain the excess liquid from the grated apples using a sieve. Then mix them with all the remaining ingredients in a bowl. Grease a baking tray with coconut oil.

item.title: How to stay calm and relaxed - Madeleine Shaw
item.description:
How to stay calm and relaxed - Madeleine Shaw

If you know me, you know I'm quite a happy chappy. However, I can get myself in an inner panic. The truth is...I'm a workaholic. I work all the time, often 7 days a week. Now don't get me wrong, I love it! However, I don't really have anyone to answer to but myself....
